feature.label: TCAT Crypto SDK
feature.description: The TCAT Crypto library provides an API wrapper around the bouncycastle ctryptography library along with various utility fucntions that are used within a variety of TCAT projects. In general, applications should rely on a built version of the TCAT Crypto libraries and do not need to access the source for this SDK directly within their programing environments.
